DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate Sun Protection Factor efficacy human skin .
DOC.criteria: Fitzpatrick Skin Type l , and/or lll UVB testing . Fitzpatrick Skin Type , lll and/or lV UVA testing . Male female . Aged 1870 year old . Good health determine HRL SHF ( Subject History Form ) . Signed date Informed Consent Form Signed date HIPAA ( Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ) form . An unambiguous MED ( Minimal Erythema Dose ) MPPD ( Minimal Persistent Pigment Darkening Dose ) . Subjects test research laboratory clinic . Known allergy sensitivity sunscreen , cosmetic toiletry , topical drug and/or ultraviolet light . Preexisting dermatologic condition diagnose medical professional ( e.g . psoriasis , eczema , etc . ) would interfere study . Preexisting medical condition ( e.g . adult asthma , diabetes ) . Treatment antihistamines corticosteroid within one week prior initiation test . Treatment antibiotic within two week prior initiation test . Chronic medication could affect result study . Known pregnant nursing woman .
